org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.recipient

Interface Recipient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePKRecipient, CertificateRecipient, RekReceipient, SignedDataRecipient, SymmetricKeyReceipient

    public interface Recipient
    Generic interface for a recipient used during encryption.

    A Recipient interface is used when sending data to others, Receiver is used when receiving data from others.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecipientInfo toRecipientInfo(AlgorithmIndicator alg, Ieee1609Dot2CryptoManager cryptoManager, javax.crypto.SecretKey encryptionKey)
      Method to return a generated ReceiptientInfo for the given encryption key.
